title: Enhancing Customer Experience Practical Competencies: Self-Regulated Learning Strategy Workshop for Science Practitioners

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational knowledge in science and secondary education experience
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Learners analyze their learning patterns through reflective journaling and derive three improvement strategies
Learners understand Self-Regulated Learning (SRL) theory and propose two strategies applicable to science lesson design
Learners achieve over 80% execution levels by establishing time management and resource utilization plans in PBL projects

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
